name: Spirugrass® Spirulina
description: Spirugrass® Spirulina is a fraction (pure chemical compound) from the biorefining of spirulina. Available in wet or dry form, this fraction is particularly rich in amino acids, iron, vitamin K and beta-carotenes.This nutritional richness, capable of satisfying recommended daily intakes with reduced quantities, makes Spirugrass® a food or nutraceutical ingredient of top quality. Its composition also allows it to be used as an organic slow-release fertilizer. It provides immediate and long-term action by improving crop growth and soil fertility.
